name: RateView
summary: RateView for iOS Objective-C is a subclass of UIView.
description:
RateView is a UIView subclass that creates a customizable rating view containing rating stars in it. 
                    It fills out the stars in percentage fill manner. It can be used for -
                    * displaying a rating for an item canRate = NO OR
                    * actually provide user a chance to rate any product or item canRate = YES.
